review_text: We enjoyed our stay. Everything was very clean. Great location on our road trip. Our son enjoyed the arcade game and the Mickey Mouse toaster!
The house was great as described and Charity and Kevin could not have been better. My wife and I loved our quick getaway there.
very cozy place felt right at home and host was very responsive to our questions .
Great, would stay again
absolutely loved this place!!! Great host who really make it feel like home away from home and are so helpful and quick to message you back. I will come back forsure.
In town for a wedding and this place was perfect! Super cute, if you’re a Mickey Mouse fan you will be absolutely amazed!
This was perfect for what we needed. The hosts were extremely friendly and accommodating!
Easy check in, place was great!
We had a very good time thank you we would love to come to your place again

We loved our stay! The kids were blown away by all of the Mickey things and carried all of the characters around all weekend. The playroom is a perfect touch for a family friendly rental. Who needs Disney world?!
Having three bedrooms was incredibly convenient as well.
Steve and Charity were both very prompt with responding to any inquiries!
We will be back to the Mickey Mouse House for sure!
It was great! Great last minute place for us to stay!

My family and I stayed here while we were on our way back from a work trip for myself. While the theme was cool and good for my kids. I felt as though the mattresses were old and not real comfortable. The comforter on the beds seemed to be dingy and I just didn’t feel like I was sleeping in a clean bed. The trundle bed in the far room was also dirty and I had to dust off before putting my kids to bed. The water pressure was also an issue for us. It was not the great and the water seemed to be very hard. The furniture and decorations seemed dusty as well. I was also not a fan of the real feather pillows in the living room area and while we were there the internet was not working and the cell signal was not great in that area either. Overall it was an ok stay but we will likely not stay here again.
Great place to stay. The Mrs Pacman game was awesome! We'll definitely stay again!

Very cute place that was Mickey Mouse themed. Every time I would turn around, I would find something else that was Mickey themed! The kids loved it. There was an old pac man machine and they really enjoyed that! They loved the play kitchen too! There was a quiet little playground/park close by and we enjoyed that! Great stay for us in a quiet neighborhood!
Very nice & clean
Charity’s places are always clean, always an easy checkin and always reasonably priced. She is my go to for Joplin stays!
Lovely and clean space
Everything was as advertised and super friendly host. Kids love the theme and atmosphere. Would definitely stay again!
Quick overnight stay. Everyone was as described.
I have been to Mr. steven before and will come back whenever I have the opportunity to a very quiet place and hosts to match very polite

This is a great place to stay. Charity is a great host and the house is very nice. We stayed here for a few days while attending a seminar and it was great to be able to relax in the recliners at the end of the day. I highly recommend this place.

Charity's place was so fun. the Disney theme was delightful. The space was very open, spotless, and so cozy. The beds were great and the area was quiet. There are other units but we didn't hear anyone. We slept so well and felt so safe. Charity was very communicative and warm and friendly. We would definitely stay again!
Love the location! It’s a great stopping point for me and my family! Thanks Again!
I recommend I have been before and will come back whenever I have the opportunity responsive host eager to help
I recommend a great host, responds very quickly and very clean and tidy
I recommend a very quiet area and friendly host

Me and my friends had a great stay! It's honestly a lot bigger than I expected, plenty of room! The two adult rooms have really big beds!! Everything was clean and the neighborhood was quite, nothing to complain about at all, Id totally book this Airbnb again!
I would stay again when in the area!

Cheap and yet a lovely place to stay. Charity even had little snacks and pancake mix etc in the kitchen which was lovely. Definitely a good place to stay for a few people if it isn’t supposed to be super expensive.

Me and my husband are very grateful for charity's listing we were on a trip from Colorado to Tennessee and her adorable Mickey mouse house was just what we were looking for it was clean comfortable she was very responsive and a wonderful host. Also the price was outstanding it meant we didn't have to sleep in the car that night. Thank you again charity for everything that you did for us and thank you for being reasonably priced unlike some other airbnbs.

We were in the area to visit family for a short time. The living room had two recliners. No other Airbnb we have used in the past (6 or 8) had recliners. For us this made relaxing away from home especially nice. The king sized bed we used slept well.
Great helpful host. Really enjoyed staying here. Probably played 5,000 games of Pac-Man on their full sized game.
It is a nice cozy and clean place 😄
We really enjoyed the place Charity and Steve are amazing host if you have an issue and reach out to them they respond really fast

This house is Grand and beautiful the pictures don't do justice to just how beautiful it truly is. If you're looking for a spacious clean relaxing Airbnb this place is perfect for you. Every room corner to corner was clean. The house is decorated with the most beautiful things eye pleasing antiques and gorgeous paintings. It reminded me of an old Victorian style charm. We will definitely be staying there again if ever in the area. Dave was wonderful and very friendly. House was exceptionally clean in all rooms.

This place was everything as described and more! We are a family of 4 and it was in a nice area and so relaxing. The front porch was a nice place to gather and the park across the street gave the kiddos a fun place to play while we cooked. We will def stay here again!
David is very friendly and quick to respond to any questions you have. As a repeat guest I can say his home has always been perfect.
We loved our stay at the house on Moffet, it was even better than what we expected. Very clean and comfortably roomy. We highly recommend!
Nice house and nice place to stay with your family

The pics don’t do this place justice. It’s located in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in Joplin. Such a lovely calm neighborhood and the house had so much charm. We had a wonderful experience.

Very beautiful place to stay we’re in town for Mother Road Mayhem and man absolutely blew my mind love the place and how amazing David was!!! Highly recommend to stay here if y’all are in the Joplin area

The House on Moffet is a real gem. The photos don't do it justice. Wonderful, relaxing, cozy, welcoming, comfortable, well-equipped, and a nice eclectic mix of vintage design. Our host David was highly responsive and well-organized. We loved sitting on the porch listening to crickets and frogs at night and watching thunderstorms roll through, as well as cooking family dinners to share at the formal dining table, and relaxing in one of the two living rooms, reading a book and listening to some records (BYO vinyl). The neighborhood is excellent - perfect for morning or evening walks among some of the oldest historic houses in Joplin, and a park right across the street makes it ideal for travelling with kids. If you're around on a Saturday, make sure to hit up Empire Market a few miles away for fresh local produce, meat, and baked goods. The nearby Bruncheonette on Main St is also not to be missed, and only a lovely 15 min walk away. We eagerly await our next opportunity to visit!
This home was beautiful! As soon as you walked in you could sense the invitation to relax and enjoy! I'm trying to figure out my schedule for when I'll be back in town:)) thank you!

What a beautiful home. The decorating was fantastic. We were so busy that we really didn't get to lounge around the way we thought we would do. I would recommend that home to anyone who is looking for a place to stay while in Joplin.

Best BnB I’ve stayed at by far. Inside the home to outside. The moment I pulled in and parked to the moment I hopped in the car and left I felt right at home. Beautiful place that photos don’t do justice and should cost more than it does. I have stayed in places more expensive that we’re not near as nice or as well kept up.

I can't say enough about how wonderful this place and the hosts are! I think our group of 4 collectively said "wow" about 18 times upon our entry into this place! absolutely gorgeous home, great instructions, we felt so at home! Any time we are in the area this is the only place we will stay!
This place was amazing! Remodeled older home but kept all the charm!!

We enjoyed our two night stay in this lovely home. It was very evident that the owners took a lot of care into planning how to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable. This house is very spacious and has multiple indoor (two living rooms) and outdoor (front porch furniture and backyard table and chairs) spaces, so guests have room to spread out and relax.

This is our 2nd time staying here. we loved it so much, that we chose to stay here again. We asked David a question and he was very quick to respond. We highly recommend this place. We definitely will stay here again if we're in the area.
Nice place to stay and greater space feels like home..

The pictures don’t do this house justice. It was so relaxing, and a great place to stay for our vacation. I didn’t even want to leave! Any questions I had, he responded quickly and was so nice and pleasant! 10000% recommend this place!
Great host and beautiful home!

This place was incredible! The house is gorgeous, and we absolutely love the neighborhood. David even had Spinal Tap available for us to watch (my wife’s favorite movie). We will definitely stay here again in the near future. Thank you so much!

Absolutely lovely house. We were able to have family over for several dinners and it was a great gathering place.
Loved sitting on the porch watching the lightning storm and just relaxing.
Highly recommended. David was incredibly responsive and helpful.
This home was absolutely stunning surrounded by other beautiful homes. Very spacious and cozy loved our stay.
David was an excellent host and the home was beautiful! We loved the history and the decor!! Thank you!!
Great stay.
The home is beautiful. Peaceful area with a park across the way. The pictures don’t do it Justice. Highly recommend

Great place. The pictures don't do this place justice----its much better than the pictures. The whole place exceeded our expectations. Before booking I reached out to David and he responded very quickly. During our visit I reached out to him and he was very quick to respond. I highly recommend this place and would stay here again. We feel honored to be his very 1st guests!

Beautiful home! We really enjoyed the garage as it was plenty big enough for larger vehicles to be parked in, with even plenty of space to move around after parking inside! The only thing we wish it had was a strainer. But, other than that we’ll definitely visit again!
Highly recommend Dominic’s place. It was perfect for our work group and we had plenty of space.
Dominic's place was great. He booked my colleagues last minute and it had everything we needed for a long term work stay. Thanks Dominic!

Dominic is a very kind and generous Host who goes out of his way to help you. His house is very spacious, clean and well kept. The backyard is huge and the location is ideal for getting around town. I would definitely recommend a stay at Dominic’s house in Joplin.
Amazing place, we felt right at home.
Dominic is always hospitable! We love staying here when in Joplin.
Always a great place to stay when in Joplin. Newly remodeled and clean
Great place to stay! Would definitely come back!
Newly remodeled. A go to place for my husband and coworkers to stay while in Joplin working!

This home is beautiful! It is very new and incredibly spacious. The beds are comfortable, and extra linens are provided, which is nice for cool nights. A pack-n-play on site is so handy too. The fully fenced backyard is HUGE. It was so nice to let the kiddos play outside! The table on the patio is really enjoyable. The garage parking is such a nice perk that many AirBnbs don't offer.
Future guests, be sure to bring shampoo and conditioner. The amenities are light; there were only two towels in the large master bathroom, but the washer and dryer on site made that manageable. We did have to wash several dishes prior to any use because unfortunately, a previous guest had put them away dirty. We appreciated having dishwasher soap to make it easy.
Dominic is a great host. He was responsive and helpful! He could not have made checking in and out any simpler, and we were very grateful for the keyless entry. Thanks for a great stay! We would definitely book this place again!

House was big and beautiful. We had a couple questions and Dominic answered quickly each time.
The neighborhood was a bit loud between a busy street, local construction and barking dogs, but we took box fans and slept great! Would recommend and would stay again!

Great place! Very spacious for our family of 8. We had a great time being together as we were in Joplin for a big family event in Pittsburg on Saturday. And….a Chiefs Super Bowl win topped it all off on Sunday! Would recommend to anyone visiting the Joplin area!
This is the 2nd home I have stayed in owned by this host. Loved it!! My coworkers did as well, we highly recommend.
Very Beautiful and Clean. Perfect place for a little weekend getaway. Beds are very comfortable. Easy check in, private, and very nice yard space. We would definitely stay again.
Great place. Brand new renovation. Lots of space!!
Great host!
Another great stay.
Good stay
Very nice and spacious.
grt place to stay
Nice spacious house, comes with washer & dryer and other appliances . Host was very nice.
Very satisfied with the house. It was just what we needed!
Shelly’s Homes are the absolute best! She is an amazing host! We’ve stayed many,many times and it is always a perfect experience!
The house was great for a few days stay in Joplin. It was very clean, beautifully decorated and the location was great for the activities we had planned.

The positive: The home is clean, has a lot of room, and has beautiful decorations. We loved having access to the huge garage, and we had plenty of room for 3 vehicles (one inside the garage, plus 2 in the wide driveway). The house is perfect for two families - the walls and set up gave all of us full privacy in our sleeping quarters. There is a huge walk-in closet in the master bedroom suite, allowing us to have ample room for all our formal clothes for our daughter's wedding. Plus, it was very nice to have a fenced-in yard for our dog. The bedroom furniture is beautiful.
Would have been nice: To have a full-length mirror, a few more laundry pods, and a couple more trash bags. The kitchen was missing a few things, but Shelly had missing items sent to the house after we called. Note: The master bedroom mattress is firm, which my husband liked, but I had to buy a memory foam topper to get more comfortable. It is also very high, so shorter people may struggle a bit to get into bed.
Very nice clean place

Great place. Beautiful house. Nice and cozy. Was able to sit outside at night and enjoy the weather and area. Close to main strip in town. If I’m back in Joplin again, this will definitely be a place I’d want to stay.

Shelly’s home was very nice and very nice and clean inside! We felt right at home and the neighborhood was also nice and quiet!! We’ve stayed in a lot of air bnbs and Shelly’s house has been the best and her decor was so pretty! Very well kept up. We cannot wait to go back and visit family because we will stay there again!
Second time we’ve stayed here and it was great again. I would definitely recommend it to anyone, and look forward to staying here again.

We have stayed here twice. We have a dog, and there is a nice fenced in area in the backyard. Our daughter attends MSSU. When we visit, there is plenty of room for her to stay with us in comfort. Both experiences have been amazing! ❤️
Shelly is a magnificent host.
Shelly is a very professional but courteous person. Not to often do you find someone like that. Amazing experience and I stay in Airbnbs more than my house

Shelly was very interactive from inquiring to check out. Her place was very nice and we felt right at home from the moment we arrived. From the fresh baked cookies and coffee to the fresh clean smell throughout the house. I would for sure book one of her properties in the future.
The only downside I would callout is we did not realize there was a camera in the living room till the night before we left and my son was a little embarrass as he had walked from bathroom to bedroom with no clothes on. I had done the same , I just don’t embarrass easy. He will survive but I just wish it were known and we may have been a little more discreet 😉
Wonderful house, felt right at home. This was a last minute booking for us and Shelly was responsive right away. Great location! Exactly what we needed for the night.
Great stay. We will return next time we are in Joplin!
When booking a place in joplin we look for one of Shellys houses!
Very welcoming and comfortable home, and easy to get around town!

Such a fantastic host to a beautiful home. The house was immaculate. Our host was helpful, proactive, and always available. We have stayed here the past two years in a row and will definitely be returning for a third.

The host was very responsive when I had questions as well as very friendly. I stayed here the night before my wedding as a quiet place for me and my bridesmaids to get ready and it was extremely spacious and accommodated the six of us perfectly. My husband and I also stayed the night of and the night after the wedding and it was a very quiet and peaceful place for us to be able to decompress. It was very clean and stocked with clean towels and linens. Overall it is a beautiful place and I would highly recommend it to anybody.
delightful stay!
Very roomy, comfortable beds, amazing host.
We've been at several of Shelly's properties and they are all clean, comfortable and stress free. Shelly is a considerate and gracious host and we enjoy staying at her homes.

Our stay was wonderful! The host went above and beyond to help us if we weren't sure where something was or if something wasn't working she was willing to come out. The host was also willing to work with us on a late checkout which was so gracious. A couple minor things like one side of the loveseat didn't recline and there was a small dent in the wall in the master bedroom, and the fenced in yard was pretty spacious but didn't have a door directly to it. Definitely minor things that didn't effect our overall enjoyment. Overall it was just what we were looking for and we will hopefully stay there again on our next visit! ❤️
Stayed many times! Love Shelly’s bnbs. Clean and comfortable! Absolutely perfect!! Shelly is awesome!

This was a great place to stay! Not too far from anything you might want to do. It was clean and everything worked as it should. My wife was intrigued by the automatic garbage can! We both liked the luxury of being able to park our vehicle in a garage. We would stay here again!

This place was the best air bnb I’ve ever stayed in. It was so cozy & beautiful. We felt right at home as soon as we walked in. We had everything we needed in each space of the house. The host was so friendly and very quick to respond to any concerns or questions. We loved our stay! 10/10
Had a wonderful stay with my kids!
The home is about 10 minutes from the highway and in a friendly area. Three cozy bedrooms and 2 full baths were plenty for us and our 2 teens. Happy New Year!

We had another great stay at Shelly’s home. We spent more time at the home this time, having our grandkids visit us instead of visiting at their house. We had a wonderful time baking cookies, playing games, crafting, and watching movies.
Thanks, Shelly, for a wonderful time.

We were in town for a family reunion / Christmas celebration. The location was perfect to go between family homes in Webb City and Leawood. Everything was immaculate and all bedding including spreads are cleaned between guests which is important to me. Layout was perfect for hanging out together no matter if you were watching TV, at the dining table, or cooking in the kitchen. The fenced in yard made it easy to give our dog some outside time. The home was beautifully decorated for Christmas providing a tree under which to place our gifts and an electric fireplace to hang our stockings. Shelly was very responsive, helpful and kind. We will stay here again!
We love this property so much and have made many memories with our family! Shelley is an extraordinary host! We love her!

My parents and I loved our stay. We appreciate that pets were welcomed as it allowed us to spend extra time with family while visiting from KC. The house was already decorated for Christmas and was lovely. Can't wait to stay again.
Shelly was a great host & very responsive! Her home was comfortable & had everything we needed. We would definitely recommend & stay again when in town.
Loved the vibe of this home!
Our stay was great! The house was decorated beautifully. Everything we needed was provided. We would be happy to stay there again. ❤️
If you’re in the Joplin area and need a place to stay, this is it. Place was perfect in every way.
Shelly is a great host and we enjoyed our stay! We’ve been to one of her locations twice in the last two months and we’re pleased both times!
The house is a lot bigger than the pictures and it is so beautiful. Decorated with though. The host is very sweet and quick to respond.
Our first stay at an Airbnb. Perfect in every way. We will stay here again when the need arises. Beautiful house. Cozy and comfortable. Beds were just like home.
Shelly's place was everything described on the website.
Beautiful home, right near the heart of town. Shelly was a great host! Will definitely try to stay here again when we’re back.
We love Shelly! Her home is absolutely beautiful and feels just like we are at home!

Shelly was so helpful and friendly from start to finish. Super clean and there is even a one car garage w/ a drive way to park your other vehicles. We really couldn’t have asked for a better place or host. We will absolutely book with Shelly again!

Amazing Place! Awesome
Host! Clean, convenient and comfortable! 5 stars all the way!!

Clean, comfy, and felt like home! Very impressed with the quality of our stay and professionalism of the host.

This is going to be my go to place to stay every time we come to Joplin. Great place. Space was perfect. Clean, close to the venue of MSSU, PERFECT!
Second time staying here it is a nice place and love Joplin!

Such a beautiful home! So very cozy and everything listed was exactly as posted! The host was so kind and so considerate with the air issue and it was addressed promptly. We most definitely will be staying at one of her properties again!

This is the place to stay. Shelly is quick to respond with any questions. We only spent one night there but loved every second of it. Clean, well decorated and very comfortable beds. We felt spoiled every second there. Thank you Shelly for starting off our first night of vacation with a great experience.
Shelly was a great host! We enjoyed our stay and felt very comfortable. Thank you for hosting us.
The home was just as advertised, clean and comfortable and nice. Beds were comfortable and we had everything we needed. Air conditioning was great, no problems.
It was very nice. When family comes again i hope this home is available
I rented this house for my staff for a convention and it was absolutely perfect! Shelly was amazing!! It was all just perfect!!

Great house, nice quiet neighborhood.

Everything was wonderful. I was there on a work project. Mrs. Shelly was a great host. If another project comes about in Joplin ,I will definitely look her up...

Amazing place!

Great stay at Shelly's. The house was easily accessible from the freeway, and unloading was a breeze with the garage. Shelly's place was clean and comfortable. We will return the next time we are in the area.

Amazing as always! I’ve stayed many times in Shelly’s bnb’s and they are always perfect! So clean and comfortable. Shelly goes above and beyond to make sure your stay will be awesome! This is the place you want!!
very nice house, very spacious and very quiet neighborhood

Shelly is so friendly. Her home was beautifully furnished. Immaculate with a feel of home! For our needs, it's very centrally located. I enjoyed having a garage to park in. Loved the place! Had everything you needed and more!! Would definitely stay again!

I couldn’t have been happier with my stay at Shelly’s home. I so appreciated the “home away from home.” I will definitely reach out to Shelly again, when I travel to MO next time! This home was awesome! We definitely recommend this place. Warm ambiance, nice, and roomy.

We’ve stayed at many of Shelly’s homes in the past, her kindness and hospitality always shines bright in her homes. Amazing Place! Spotless clean, very Roomy, amazing beds. Loved the layout.
Absolutely loved the leather couch!
5 star place! Thanks again Shelly!
Shelly is communicative and thorough- very nice touch with home made cookies to welcome you. house is great. can hear traffic etc. at night but overall great experience.

Perfect place for our quick get away. Home looks just as pictured with lots of extras. Fireplace, fresh baked cookies and the lights on waiting for our arrival! Was nice to have a garage as well. I would highly recommend this home!
We had a good experience! The beds were very comfortable, the house smelled amazing also the kids loved the baked cookies that were there for us when we arrived!

Wow 🤩 BEST AirBnB experience ever. Everything was clean and very nice. Small touches of details like yummy just baked cookies and a fan did not go un-noticed. Thank you for everything. Place was so cozy and next to a lot of things to do and places to eat.
Absolute gem and perfect for what we needed. Shelly went above and beyond in all aspects and we will refer to her Airbnb for anyone staying in Joplin.

Place was clean and cozy..
Perfect and the Pool.
Thank you for my stay...

We loved the apartment!! Everything was there. Whatever you can think off. Beautiful and clean. You feel the love they put in there. Lovely hosts and they even warned us for the storm and if we where afraid we could knock on their door any time. Will be back for sure.
Great stay at Roger and Trena's place while I was in town. Thank you Roger and Trena for allowing me to stay in your home.

Staying at Roger and Trena’s was exceptional! It was in a great location and they thought of everything that you would need in this little apartment. If we come back to Joplin we would most definitely stay here again!
The apartment was beautifully decorated. They thought of anything you could possibly want or need. Each room is fully equipped.
Great Place to stay!!

Came to town for a wedding. Easy check in, excellent finishes in the apartment, had everything we need, when we talked to our hosts they were very friendly. When in town again this will be our first choice!

This was the cutest little apartment! Everything was clean and beautifully arranged and decorated. The coffee/snack bar was fantastic with provided bottled water, coffee and tea, as well as a few snacks. The hosts provided thoughtful extras for the bathroom as well with shampoo, lotion, etc. The bed was comfortable, and the sound machine and fan were thoughtful additions for a good night’s sleep. I forgot my pillow when we checked out and they graciously accommodated me coming back to pick it up. Highly recommend them for a wonderful stay!

Great stay! Everything spotless! Bed comfortable. Convenient for on and off the highway, you can hear traffic in the front room but not the bedroom. There is a fan for white noise if needed. We slept great! Would stay again!
I really enjoyed my stay at Roger and Trena’s. Everything was very high quality. 10/10 would recommend.

My husband and I stayed here as one of many stops on our roadtrip. Trena and Roger's place was very clean, very comfortable, and very cute. They set up the loft in such a way that utilities the small space without feeling cramped. We felt very safe and comfortable here. If ever we find our way back to Joplin we will be staying with them again, whether it's at this location or another property of their's.
Thank you, Trena and Roger!!!
Can’t say enough how great this place was!

This was the cutest place! It was spotless. Although the space is not large, it was perfect for us. Trena and Roger have utilized the space quite well. The bed was so comfortable, and the furnishings were great! If we make it back to Joplin, we would stay here hands down!
Second stay in a week! Roger and Trena’s Loft is awesome. Well equipped and compact, very cozy and comfortable. Highly recommend!
A great stop on our move across the country! Rodger and Trena were very responsive and had everything we needed for a good nights rest. Would highly recommend this lovely spot!
This loft space is compact, well-equipped, beautifully decorated, and in like new condition. Great place for a stopover while visiting relatives.
Very well organized and decorated perfectly! Would definitely stay again if we come through this part of town again!
The space was nice.
This is our 2nd time to stay here. Feels like home. We will be back

A really peaceful and welcoming space; clean, decorated nicely, etc. I was not there a lot during my stay, but if I had been longer it looks like the kitchen is set up for anything a person would need once you get your own food (and pull out the drawers to find what may not be visible in an 'easy on the eyes' sort of way).

I loved this place! So quaint and sweetly decorated! I just felt at home the moment I walked in the door! Roger and Trena are super helpful and kind hosts who know what they are doing! Check in was a breeze, snacks, waters, just very very thoughtful! I can’t wait to go back!
This place was AWESOME! They literally thought of everything down to a washcloth for makeup! Will definitely stay here again!
really wonderful stay!
